description:
For whatever reason, the format of the limits response changed in OSAPI v1.1:
http://docs.openstack.org/openstack-compute/developer/content/ch03s09.html

We don't seem to have updated our code to match.  For example, uri and regex need to be pulled up into the rate element.

I personally think we should not tinker with the OSAPI v1.1 when there's no overwhelming reason to, as appears to be the case here.  It shows a profound disrespect for our users, who must then update their code.

Kudos to Brian Lamar for finding this one.
title: Limits response is not correct in OSAPI v1.1
